name: Little Anne (KenOshiro)
description:
Little Anne is a 3D platformer inspired by Inside. Run and hide from the big bad wolves in an atmospheric cyberpunk setting.

Created for the course "Game Project" from Aalto University Master's Degree in Game Design & Production (2021).

Art : Gabriel Moise
Programming: Gabriel Moise, Emil Levo, Ken Oshiro
Music: Mikko Heikinpoika
